entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and protagonist of the story. He is described as casting Shield Charms and observing the battle in the Great Hall.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the antagonist of the story. His would-be victims, Seamus Finnigan and Hannah Abbott, are mentioned as darting past Harry into the Great Hall.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus is one of Voldemort's would-be victims. He is described as darting past Harry into the Great Hall with Hannah Abbott.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: Hannah is one of Voldemort's would-be victims. She is described as darting past Harry into the Great Hall with Seamus Finnigan.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: Charlie is a member of the Weasley family and is described as overtaking Horace Slughorn on the front steps of the Great Hall.

entities.name: horace slughorn
entities.description: Horace is a Hogwarts professor who is still wearing his emerald pajamas. He is described as being overtaken by Charlie Weasley on the front steps of the Great Hall.

entities.name: ban
entities.description: Ban is a centaur who bursts into the hall with Ronan and Magorian, causing a great clatter of hooves.

entities.name: ronan
entities.description: Ronan is a centaur who bursts into the hall with Ban and Magorian, causing a great clatter of hooves.

entities.name: magorian
entities.description: Magorian is a centaur who bursts into the hall with Ban and Ronan, causing a great clatter of hooves.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who leads the charge of house-elves into the entrance hall, screaming and waving carving knives and cleavers. He is described as wearing the locket of Regulus Black on his chest.

entities.name: regulus black
entities.description: Regulus is a member of the Black family, and his locket is worn by Kreacher on his chest as he leads the charge of house-elves into the entrance hall.

relationships.description: Harry is a victim of Voldemort's plans, as his would-be victims, Seamus Finnigan and Hannah Abbott, are mentioned as darting past Harry into the Great Hall.
Charlie Weasley overtakes Horace Slughorn on the front steps of the Great Hall, indicating a physical relationship between them.
Ban and Ronan burst into the hall together with Magorian, causing a great clatter of hooves. This indicates that they broke in together.
Ban and Magorian burst into the hall together with Ronan, causing a great clatter of hooves. This indicates that they broke in together.
Kreacher wears the locket of Regulus Black on his chest as he leads the charge of house-elves into the entrance hall.
